project.elearnt

Class Properties

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • project.elearnt.Properties

  • public class Properties
extends Activity
    This class responsible for make the principal options of the project, like, name and graphic mode, when finish, if project not exists create then in the directory specified by path_projects, else start activity ProjectExists to modify (recreate, change, delete or send)
    Version:
    1.0 November 27, 2014
    Author:
    Jose Ignacio Madan Frias
